speech:
If you or a friend are having trouble sharing your screen you can check three things!
1. check your computer privacy settings does Teams or the browser you're using have access to seeing and manipulating your screen?
2. do you have permission? in some organizations the host of the team only has approved members share their screen 
3. if you're on a browser it may not have the capabilities to display your screen, try switching to the desktop app!

If the quality of your display is poor
4.check your wifi capabilities streaming takes a lot of upload speed (and your friend's download speed).

Other reasons 
5.outdated Microsoft Teams make sure you have the latest version!

None of these help? 
Consider the Microsoft Community Website! https://answers.microsoft.com/en-us/msteams/forum?sort=LastReplyDate&dir=Desc&tab=All&status=all&mod=&modAge=&advFil=&postedAfter=&postedBefore=&threadType=All&isFilterExpanded=false&page=1
